This film follows U.S President Abraham Lincoln during the Civil War, as he grapples with moral and political dilemmas while fighting for emancipation. Joseph Gordon-Levitt delivers a compelling performance in this thought-provoking film.

Another suggestion would be 'The Last Samurai', starring Tom Cruise. This action-packed drama combines Eastern and Western culture, following the journey of an American mercenary who becomes entwined with the last remnants of Japan's traditional samurai class during the Meiji Restoration. The film offers a unique blend of historical accuracy and exciting storytelling.

Alternatively, if you prefer a classic romantic drama, "Emma" (1815) might be up your alley. This Jane Austen novel adaptation tells the story of a matchmaker who finds herself entangled in her own love triangle, featuring Gwyneth Paltrow as the title character.
